description: This file contains Backbone.js models, collections, views, and router for a Todo application, including class definitions for Todo, TodoList, TodoView, TodoRouter, and AppView, along with application initialization code.

classes.name: Todo
classes.description: Model representing a single todo item with default attributes, toggle, initialize, and clear methods.

classes.name: TodoList
classes.description: Collection of Todo models backed by localStorage, with methods for filtering and sorting.

classes.name: TodoView
classes.description: View for individual todo items, handling rendering, editing, toggling, and removal.

classes.name: TodoRouter
classes.description: Router managing filter routes for the todo list.

classes.name: AppView
classes.description: Top-level view managing the overall application UI, including rendering, event handling, and initializing the router.

methods.name: defaults
methods.description: Returns default attributes for a Todo model.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes a Todo model, ensuring it has a title.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the completed state of a Todo.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Removes the Todo from storage.

methods.name: completed
methods.description: Filters the collection for completed todos.

methods.name: remaining
methods.description: Filters the collection for remaining todos.

methods.name: nextOrder
methods.description: Calculates the next order number for new todos.

methods.name: comparator
methods.description: Defines sorting order based on 'order' attribute.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the individual Todo item view.

methods.name: toggleDone
methods.description: Toggles the completed state of the model.

methods.name: toggleVisible
methods.description: Shows or hides the Todo view based on filter.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Switches the view into editing mode.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Saves or removes the Todo based on input.

methods.name: updateOnEnter
methods.description: Handles Enter key to save changes.

methods.name: revertOnEscape
methods.description: Reverts changes on Escape key.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Destroys the Todo model.

methods.name: setFilter
methods.description: Sets the current filter for the Todo list.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the overall app UI, including stats and filters.

methods.name: addOne
methods.description: Adds a single Todo item view to the list.

methods.name: addAll
methods.description: Adds all Todo items to the list.

methods.name: filter
methods.description: Sets the current filter criteria.

methods.name: filterOne
methods.description: Triggers visibility update for a Todo.

methods.name: filterAll
methods.description: Applies filter to all Todos.

methods.name: newAttributes
methods.description: Creates attributes for a new Todo.

methods.name: createOnEnter
methods.description: Creates a new Todo on Enter key press.

methods.name: clearCompleted
methods.description: Removes all completed Todos.

methods.name: toggleAllComplete
methods.description: Marks all Todos as completed or active.
